author: Not specified

facts: Plans to expand fiber network to cover more than 50 million homes/businesses.
Announced $40 billion in dividends and buybacks over three years.
organizations.name: AT&T

quote: Telecom giant AT&T (NYSE: T) beat expectations on all fronts when it reported its fourth-quarter results on Monday.
summary: Telecom giant AT&T exceeded expectations with its fourth-quarter results. The company reported significant upgrades in various sectors, including a 3.5% increase in mobility service revenue, a 7.2% rise in broadband revenue, and a free cash flow of $17.6 billion. Additionally, AT&T confirmed its 2025 guidance and announced plans to expand its fiber network to over 50 million homes and businesses. The company's strategic fiber-wireless bundling aims to increase customer retention and revenue stability. AT&T is also planning substantial investments in artificial intelligence to optimize operations and enhance service quality, alongside issuing $40 billion in dividends and stock buybacks over the next three years.
title: The Secret to AT&T's Monster Quarter
